goal.en: Introduction to CMOS VLSI circuit design, high speed logic circuit design, arithmetic circuit and basic memory circuit.

outline.en:
The First Half of the Semester
*Chapter 1 Introduction to VLSI
*Chapter 2 The Metal Oxide Semiconductor ( MOS ) Transistor
*Chapter 3 CMOS Processing Technology
*Chapter 4 Circuit Characterization and Performance Estimation
*Chapter 5 CMOS Circuit and Logic Design: Static / Dynamic Logic (High Speed Logic Design/Focal Point of this Course)
The Second Half of the Semester
*Chapter 9 Fast Two-Operand Adders/Subtractors
*Basic Menory
*Low power SRAM/DRAM
*High-Speed Digital Communication Circuit (Optional)

textbook.en:
1  Principles of CMOS VLSI Design by N. H. E. Weste and K. Eshraghian (buy for yourself)
2  CMOS VLSI Design A Circuits and Systems Prespective by N. H. E. Weste and D.M. Harris (buy for yourself)
3  Lecture Notes : Power Point (to register the hard copy)
4  Lecture Notes : Written Notes (access in the network)

gradMethod.en:
-Midterm Exam (40%)
-Midterm Project : High Speed Frequency Divider Circuit (10%)
-Final Exam(40%)
-Final Project : 32 bits Adder Design(10%)
